name: Just Defense
description:
"Just Defense" is a simple defense game.

Upgrade your weapons, build turrets and kill enemies.

There are 50 rounds and 2 boss rounds.
It will take about 2 ~ 4 hours.

Turrets
- Laser
- Gatling
- Missile
- Poison

Weapons
- Laser
- Plasma
- Explosive Ammo
- Rocket Launcher

Boss
- Nightmare
- Perderos
